Module com.example.byebyeboxeyes
Package com.example.byebyeboxeyes.model

Class TimerDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.byebyeboxeyes.model.TimerDAO
public class TimerDAO extends Object
The Data Access Object for the Timer class Creates a Timer DB that is connected to the userID Uses methods to handle creating the timer DB if one doesn't exist, saving timers to the logged users profile, loading the timers for the current logged user, delete the timers from the DB, delete timers from the current logged users added timers, update timers that have been edited, and set the favourite timers to the user profile

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static TimerDAO getInstance()

    • saveTimer

      public int saveTimer(int userID, int hours, int minutes, int seconds, int favourite)
      Save a timer into the timers.db for the current logged-in user
      Parameters:
      userID - saves the userID as the primary key in the timers.db table
      hours - int hours in the format 00 to 59
      minutes - int minutes in the format 00 to 59
      seconds - int sec in the format of 00 to 59
      favourite - favourite the selected timer to the favourite section
      Returns:
      the saved userID with the entered hour,min,sec to the favourite column in the timers.db

    • loadTimers

      public void loadTimers(int userID, TimerDAO.TimersLoadCallback callback)
      Load the timers from the timers.db
      Parameters:
      userID - userID associated with the timers.db
      callback - executed when the function completes or some event happens

    • deleteTimer

      public void deleteTimer(int pk)
      Delete timer from table in timers.db
      Parameters:
      pk - takes int for timer ID

    • deleteTimersForUser

      public void deleteTimersForUser(int userId)
      Delete the timer from current user takes the current user and gets their ID to be deleted from their profile
      Parameters:
      userId - int that takes the userID

    • updateTimer

      public void updateTimer(int pk, int hours, int minutes, int seconds, int isFavourite)
      Updates the timer table in the timers.db
      Parameters:
      pk - get the timer ID
      hours - int hours field
      minutes - int minutes field
      seconds - int seconds field
      isFavourite - int for favourite timerID
